org.fcrepo.server.search

Class TestFieldSearchSQLImpl.MockSqlUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.server.utilities.SQLUtility
      • org.fcrepo.server.search.TestFieldSearchSQLImpl.MockSqlUtility
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestFieldSearchSQLImpl.UnusedMockSqlUtility
    Enclosing class:
    TestFieldSearchSQLImpl

    public abstract static class TestFieldSearchSQLImpl.MockSqlUtility
extends SQLUtility
    Base class for Mock SQLUtility implementations. Every method causes the test to fail, unless overridden by the subclass.
